title: Digicert || JpMorgan&Chase Offers
content:
Education: Tier - 2
Graduation Year: 2019
Years of Experience: 5 Years.
Current Org: Non-FAANG product based. (currently in bnglr)
current CTC: 23.55 LPA CTC.
Offer From Company: **Digicert Security India private limited**(Bnglr), **JPMorgan&Chase** (Hyd)
Date of the Offer: October 2024
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer and SWE 2 respectively
Location: Bangalore and Hyderabad for JpMorgan&Chase with relocation reimbursement
Salary: 30 LPA and 29LPA respectively
Bonus ~ 7% and 12% respectively
Stocks: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 32.10LPA and 32.40LPA respectively
Benefits: gym reimbursement (15k/year) and food coupon (rs. 26500/year) in Digicert and none in JPMorgan&Chase

Suggest me which one should I join?
company: Digicert Security India Private Limited (bnglr), Jpmorgan&chase (hyd)
role: Senior Software Engineer And Swe 2 Respectively
cleanCompany: Digicert Security India Private Limited Bnglr Jpmorgan Chase Hyd

title: Dream 11 | SDE-1 | Mumbai
content:
Education: M.Tech CSE from a Tier-1 College (2024 batch)
Years of Experience: 1
Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Dream11
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Mumbai, India
Base Salary: 22 LPA
Relocation: Hotel stay + Flight tickets + Packing/Moving expenses
Joining Bonus: 4.4L INR 
Stock bonus: 12.6L INR Vested over 4 years
Proximity Allowance: Minimum of (50% of rent OR 35k) per month given you stay within 60 minutes from the office
CTC - 39LPA
Benefits: Unlimited Paid leaves, International Trip, Gym, Insurance and other standard benefits.

Interview Experience : https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5868623/Dream-11-or-SDE-1-or-Mumbai-or-Sep-2024-Offer

title: Google | L3 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BTech in CSE from Tier 1
Years of Experience: ~2 yrs
Prior Companies: MNC
Current TC: ~50L (20.3L Cash + 30L RSUs)
Date of the Offer: 9th october 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L3 / SWE2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 21.9L Base + 1.47 (PF + gratuity) ~ 23.4
Relocation: 3L
Signing Bonus: N/A (Didn't include in the compensation)
Stock bonus: 52k for 4 years (38%, 32%, 18%, 12% split)
Bonus: 15% of base salary ~ 3.28L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 46.24L 
Benefits: Standard google benefits
Other details: Offer accepted.

title: Agoda Offer | Software Engineer | Gurgaon
content:
Current Salary - 24L (Fixed)
Role - SDE-3 
Experience - 7 years
Company - PBC (Fintech)
Location - Remote

Agoda
Role - Software Engineer (Downleveled from Senior Software Engineer)
Location - Gurgaon (Hybrid)
Salary - 34L (after negotiation, original - 32L)
Perf Bonus - 6L
Standard Agoda benefits

I am not sure about both Salary and Role whether it would be good to accept this offer.

Please share your suggestions
